channel.title: Rstats on The Jumping Rivers Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rstats on The Jumping Rivers Blog

item.title: Official StanCon Sponsor
item.description: Stan is freedom-respecting, open-source software for facilitating statistical inference at the frontiers of applied statistics. Or to put it another way, it makes Bayesian inference fast. StanCon is the premier conference for all things Stan related.
